divs: sighting detailsit was around one thirty a.m. when my sister and i were sitting on a second floor balcony of our hotel facing north. there was a mild fog\haze surrounding the whole area, since we were about a hundred yards from the shore. only stars directly above us were visible. her and i decided to try to get on the roof for a better view, and not fearing the repercussions, we got on the elevator. the structure had twelve floors, each with north and south-east facing balconies. as we got out of the elevator, we noticed a communal balcony to the right of the elevator, facing south-east, facing the ocean and part of the city. we appeared to be at the highest point within eye's view [which was about a mile or two, due to the haze.] as we got out, we began to smoke a cigarette and discuss whatever was on our minds at the time when my sister noticed three very bright red lights stationary about three hundred yards in the air, and about a mile or two away from our location to our left. we focused in and noticed that it wasn't moving in any direction. simply floating in the sky. my sister asked if it could be a star or a planet, but due to the haze, it was sure that the light wouldn't come through. it was in the sky, in front of the fog. five, ten and fifteen minutes went by with this object in the same position above the ocean. i inferred from its fix that it was gathering information about that particular region of the sea. about twenty minutes had passed when we noticed a small white ball, about the twice the size as a start appears in the sky eject from the left side of this red-lit object. it continued on a straight path slowly for about five minutes, seemingly probing the area, until it stopped, and returned to where it had come from. the moment the orb had made its entry, the craft began slowly moving south-east, and using refrence points on the ground, we tracked its movement until it disappeared into the mist. during the duration of this event, we both felt as if our presence was acknowledged by whomever was piloting the craft. emotionally, it was a mixture of fear and interest, but my sister's eyes were indicating her fear over interest.
Summary: ufo above the ocean. studying and probing on the new jersey shore.
